title: Smart Light
m_descr: In the daytime light is switched on for 100%, at night the light turns on for 20%. If you select the button dimmer, when you press the dimmer button up - light will turn on for 100%, if press button down - light will turn off and one minute will not respond to the motion sensor.
l_Level: Dimmer levels for day and night
l_Day: The time interval when the light is switched on for Day Level
h_DimmerButton: To generate dimmer button activate module SwitchControlGenerator and then press dimmer button
